short.ko: "클래식한 Tiny Tycoon의 즐거움을 Chrome 확장 프로그램으로 경험해보세요 - 지금 바로 시도해보세요!"

short.th: สัมผัสความตื่นเต้นแบบคลาสสิกของ Tiny Tycoon ในรูปแบบของ Chrome extension - ลองเลย!
short.uk: Découvrez l'excitation classique de Tiny Tycoon sous la forme d'une extension Chrome - Essayez maintenant !
short.vi: Trải nghiệm cảm giác hồi hộp cổ điển của Tiny Tycoon dưới dạng tiện ích Chrome - Hãy thử ngay bây giờ!
short.zh_CN: 体验 Tiny Tycoon 的经典刺激，作为一个 Chrome 扩展——立即试用！
short.zh_TW: 歡迎嘗試 Tiny Tycoon 的經典刺激玩法，成為 Chrome 擴充功能！立即試試看！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tiny Tycoon: Build Your Empire on a Tiny Planet 🚀
Tiny Tycoon is a fun and addictive clicker game where you collect resources by tapping on materials. The more you gather, the bigger your empire grows. 🌍

Features:
Offline Play: No internet? No problem! Enjoy the game anytime, anywhere. 🌐❌
Endless Worlds: Explore unlimited procedurally generated planets. Each adventure is unique! 🪐✨
Simple Controls: Easy-to-use controls make for an enjoyable experience. Just tap and play! 👆
Retro Art Style: Enjoy charming retro 2D/3D graphics that bring your tycoon to life. 🎨🕹️
Engaging Gameplay: Feel the satisfaction of building and expanding your empire. 💪🏗️
Progress Tracking: Keep an eye on your stats to see how far you've come. 📊📈
Battery Saver: An option to save laptop battery life, so you can play longer. 🔋💡
Too Many Clicks? No Worries!
Hire Workers: Get a workforce to help you gather resources. The more workers you have, the faster you progress! 👷‍♂️👷‍♀️
Assign Tasks: Manage your team to optimize resource collection and build your rocket ship. 🚀👩‍🔧👨‍🔧
Launch Missions: Once your rocket is ready, embark on new missions and expand your tycoon to other worlds! 🌌🎯
Get ready to build, click, and conquer in Tiny Tycoon! 🌟

Play more on the top-left menu.
